definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 当等待植物生长时，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: For whom, for whom, who has waited for eternity in a thousand years?
sentences.chinese: 为谁倾尽一生，为谁把千年等待刻成一个永恒？

sentences.english: Calmly wait ’til they’re done, and then provide the answer.
sentences.chinese: 冷静地等待，直到他们说完，然后再给出你的回答。

sentences.english: After all, sitting and waiting is how we made money from the subprime debacle.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，我们如何从次贷崩溃赚钱就是坐着等待。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: You don't wait two minutes for Windows to put up.
sentences.chinese: 无需花两分钟等待Windows启动。

sentences.english: He needs to go to Guadalajara for his visa.
sentences.chinese: 他得去瓜达哈拉纳等待签证。

sentences.english: The number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot.
sentences.chinese: 在照下萤幕截图前等待的秒数。

sentences.english: He waited for the announcement of the result of the competition with bated breath.
sentences.chinese: 他屏息静气地等待宣布竞赛结果。

sentences.english: How long will that special date? Llama Llama has to wait.
sentences.chinese: 多久才到这个特别的日子？羊驼拉玛要等待。

sentences.english: I will talk about abilities in the next piece, please be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我会在下一章讲到能力，请耐心等待。

sentences.english: Waiting for a fight, waiting for a rewarding experience of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 等待着一场战斗，等待着一次满载而归的出击。

sentences.english: Waiting for a fight, waiting for a rewarding experience of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 等待着一场战斗，等待着一次满载而归的出击。

sentences.english: If you wait , all that happens is that you get older. __Larry McMurtry.
sentences.chinese: 如果你等待，发生的只是你变老。

sentences.english: The three of us stood in the bathroom eagerly waiting for the telltale line to appear.
sentences.chinese: 我们三个一起站在洗澡间殷切等待仪器指示线的出现。

sentences.english: The female cub is waiting aside and see if her brothers have made any progress.
sentences.chinese: 小雌虎则在一旁等待哥哥们有没有进展。

definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
